question:
Your local council is considering closing a sports and leisure centre that it runs, in order to save money.
Write a letter to the local council. In your letter

give details of how you and your friends or family use the centre
explain why the centre is important for the local community
describe the possible effects on local people if the centre closes
text: My name is Rober Smith and I am one the member of your local community who lives in Lawarnce Apartment at floor 7. I am writing this letter regarrding to reconsider your decision of closing one and only sport center that we have at Younge street.

As you're aware of the fact that we are community of over 10 tohousand people and we only this center for our recreational and creative activites. I and my son always go for a walk in morning time and also use a swimming pool to keep ourselves fit. Most of the childern are playing soccer, cricket too every evening. Along with this these centre organize many helpfull seminars for children as well as for adults.

If the center will  shut down then local people definitely feel the left out as they don't have any near place where they can utilies their free time.This is  not acceptable at all.  If cutting the cost is the problem then I am sure we can reconcile to other alternatives. Everyone from local community are agains of this decision.
Please reconsider the decision of closing that centre.
